DOC.brief_summary: This study aim describe immune response second dose Japanese encephalitis chimeric vaccine ( JECV ) child previously vaccinate one dose JECV 5 year ago .
DOC.brief_title: Antibody Response Boosted Japanese Encephalitis Chimeric Virus Vaccine ( JE-CV ) Children
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective study demonstrate boost antibody response child previously vaccinate one dose JECV 5 year ago .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject vaccinate 1 dose JECV JEC02 participate 5 year followup JEC05 trial finish year 5 followup . 2 . Provision Informed Consent Form sign least one parent legally acceptable representative . 3 . Subject parent/legally acceptable representative guardian able attend schedule visit comply trial procedure 4 . In good general health , base medical history physical examination 1 . Participation another clinical trial investigate vaccine need vaccination blood draw within 4 week precede trial vaccination except JEC05 2 . Planned participation another clinical trial Day0Day28 period 3 . Receipt live vaccine within 4 week precede trial vaccination 4 . Planned receipt vaccine 4 week follow trial vaccination 5 . Receipt blood bloodderived product past 3 month , might interfere assessment immune response 6 . Known systemic hypersensitivity vaccine component , history lifethreatening reaction vaccine use trial vaccine contain substance 7 . Chronic illness underlie illness , opinion investigator , stage might interfere trial conduct completion
